explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning techniques in the title and discusses their application in credit rating prediction.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper refers to supervised learning techniques in the context of classifier construction and prediction model development.
explanations.classification: The study focuses on nine-class classification for credit rating prediction, which is a central aspect of the research.
explanations.decision tree: The paper mentions Bagging-DT (Decision Tree) as one of the classification techniques used, achieving high accuracy.
explanations.clustering: Data clustering is mentioned as one of the data preprocessing methods applied in the first stage of the analysis.
explanations.feature learning: Feature selection is discussed as part of the data preprocessing stage, which is related to feature learning.
